title: Software Engineer - Java Developer
description:
Join us as a Java Developer at Dedalus, one of the World’s leading healthcare technology companies, on our Product Business Unit Team in Cairo, Egypt to do the best work of your career and make a profound impact in providing better care for a healthier planet.


What you’ll achieve


As a Java Developer you will be part of our highly successful development team, utilising your skills in the development and enhancement of our market leading software applications for the hospital and healthcare environment.

Working with an extended highly skilled team, you will be making a profound impact throughout the healthcare sector.


You will be:

  • Responsible for developing and supporting Java projects, completing specific client work, projects while ensuring commitment and quality through to completion.
  • Involved in using established work procedures to analyze, design, develop, implement, maintain, re-engineer and troubleshoot large scale mission critical application.
  • Constantly focusing on scalability, maintainability, security, and performance.
  • Contributing to the technological evolution of our market leading product portfolio.
  • Interface with numerous functional areas involved in product design and development.
  • Working with a skilled team right through from concept to installation and maintenance.


Take the next step towards your dream career


At Dedalus Life flows through our software. Every day we do something special by helping caregivers and health professionals deliver better care to their served communities. Take the next step in your career that will make a profound impact. Here’s what you’ll need to succeed:


Essential Requirements

  • HANDS ON EXPERIENCE – 0-2 YRS.
  • Extremely fluent in Core Java, JSP and Servlets, EJB 3.0, Eclipse, Ajax, JavaScript and XML
  • Experience on JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX & JSON knowledge
  • Familiarity on SQL queries/ basic.
  • Excellent debugging skills; able to debug complex technical issues involving multiple system components.
  • Proven experience on Unit Test Automation (jUNIT)
  • Excellent at SOLID design principles, and understanding of various other design patterns.
  • Effective problem-solving skills.
  • Experience with Agile methodologies.
  • Command of languages: English (Excellent)
  • Identify options for potential solutions and assess them for technical and business suitability
  • Keep abreast of technical and industry developments
  • Familiarity with version control systems such as TFS, Bit bucket, IBMs CM Synergy & code management principles.


Desirable Requirements

  • Masters’ or Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, MIS, or Engineering
  • 2+ years of relevant IT experience with solid technical exposure,
  • Should have experience on designing/developing large scale or mission critical applications, preferably in the field of Healthcare.
  • Exposure to Mobile platforms (Android/iOS) is an added advantage.
  • Passion for programming extends beyond working hours.
  • Experience of liaising extensively with external (onsite) or internal clients


We are Dedalus, come join us


Dedalus is committed to providing an engaging, rewarding work experience that reflects the passion our employees bring to our mission of helping clinicians and nurses deliver better care to their served communities.


Our company fosters a culture where employees are encouraged to learn and innovate, and to enable and enhance clinical co-operation and processes while making a meaningful difference for millions of people around the world. Each person is the end point and the starting point of the Group’s activities and the ultimate beneficiary. For this reason, we are so proud of doing our very special jobs each day.


Our company is enriched by a diverse population of 7,600 people in more than 40 countries that work together to innovate and drive better healthcare options for millions of patients around the world. We are the people of Dedalus.


Application closing date: 12th January 2024


Our Diversity & Inclusion Commitment sets out Dedalus’ approach to ensuring respect, inclusion and success for all our colleagues and the wider communities we operate in. It is imperative for us to share our commitment and dedication to ensure an inclusive and diverse workplace. We recognise that we have improvements to make and, on this journey, we must remain authentic and realistic but also ambitious.

https://www.dedalus.com/global/en/diversity-inclusion/


Life Flows Through Our Software

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We Are Expanding and hiring Senior Back End Developer with +4 years of Experience

About the company:

We are a rapidly growing company in the health and fitness sector, renowned for our innovative approach and customer-centric services. We are on the lookout for a seasoned Senior Backend Developer to join our dynamic team and play a pivotal role in taking our services to the next level.

About the Role:

As our Backend Developer, you'll be at the heart of our technical operations. Harnessing the power of GraphQL and Node.js, you'll architect robust backend services that serve as the foundation of our dynamic platform. Your expertise will be pivotal in managing and optimizing our PostgreSQL database, ensuring data accuracy and swift retrievals. But it's not just about code. You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, translating their needs into API schemas that drive seamless interactions on WILMA. Familiarity with version control software will be key, as you'll be instrumental in ensuring the integrity and evolution of our codebase. And as we operate within an agile framework, your ability to adapt, iterate, and innovate will be crucial. Here, every line of code isn't just functionality—it's a step closer to enhancing our users' wellness journeys.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the backend development team in crafting high-quality, scalable solutions.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of backend functionalities.
  • Oversee server setup, API development, and database integration, ensuring optimal performance and security.
  • Contribute to the strategic direction of the project, bringing innovative ideas to the table.
  • Design, develop, and maintain backend services using Node.js and GraphQL.
  • Collaborate with our frontend team to define and implement API schemas.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of our backend services.
  • Work on our PostgreSQL database, ensuring data integrity and efficiency.
  • Utilize version control software to manage codebase and collaborate with the team.
  • Participate in our agile development process, from sprint planning to retrospectives.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in backend development, preferably in the health and fitness domain.
  • Proven leadership experience, with a track record of leading successful development teams.

 

Skills:

  • Proficiency in backend programming using Node.js.
  • Expertise in database management systems using PostgreSQL
  • Strong understanding of API development and integration with GraphQL.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and leadership skills.
  • Interested candidate please send your CV to: m.elia@samsamouy.com

title: Lead/Senior Backend Engineer (Fintech)
description:
The world's first wallet connected debit card that lets you spend funds directly from any EVM non-custodial wallet without having to off-ramp or lock/transfer your on-chain balance.

The foundation will be our off-chain collateralized stablecoins (starting with USD, EUR and GBP) that we’ll embed with real-world financial rails integrations (Visa, Mastercard, SEPA, SWIFT, FPS) to enable free and seamless movement between fiat and cryptocurrencies.

The Role

As a Backend Engineer, you’ll be directly working with the product team. In this fast pace environment, you’ll be given complex banking and crypto problems to solve, develop and deploy. You are obsessed with good architecture, efficiency, and resilience and want nothing but the best product for our customers.

Your speed, ability to deliver, and capacity to come up with the most elegant solutions will make you one of the pillars of our engineering team.

We want to revolutionize the FinTech industry. Create a new paradigm. And we need the best minds to do it.

Your Responsibilities Will Include

  • Design and build the app’s Core API, in-house ledger and onboarding flows
  • Integrate with key 3rd party providers for KYC/AML/Payment flows
  • Maintain our CI/CD pipeline and security infrastructure (together with the rest of the Engineering team)

Ideal Profile

What We Are Looking For

  • Experience with Java, Redis, Spring Boot, Kotlin
  • Understanding of relational and no-SQL databases
  • Experience in Fintech
  • Ability to develop, test and deploy microservices to support our core banking services
  • Experience with GCP or AWS
  • Ability to develop, debug, test, and deploy mobile APIs
  • 4+ years of experience as a Backend Engineer
  • Experience with crypto/web3
  • Experience with payments

What's on Offer?

  • Leadership Role
  • Excellent career development opportunities
  • Work alongside & learn from best in class talent

title: Web/App Developer
description:
This position is open to remote candidates globally!!!


Experienced Mobile and Web Developer (React Native)


**Company Overview:**

We are a leading company in the service and retail industry, known for our rapid growth and innovative approach. Our focus on digital-led lead generation strategies has set us apart in our sector. We are now seeking an experienced Mobile and Web Developer who is proficient in React Native and ready to embrace the challenges of a dynamic work environment.


**Job Description:**

As an Experienced Mobile and Web Developer, you will play a crucial role in managing, developing, and optimizing our mobile applications and websites. This position is open to remote candidates globally, and we particularly value Arabic language skills as our platforms are bilingual.


**Key Responsibilities:**

1. **Development and Management:**

  - Lead the development and maintenance of our mobile applications and websites using React Native and relevant web technologies.

  - Ensure seamless Right-to-Left (RTL) development for our bilingual platforms.


2. **Collaboration with Teams:**

  - Work in close coordination with the digital marketing team to ensure pixel-perfect integrations and support our digital-led lead generation strategies.

  - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to bring new features and improvements to life.


3. **Technical and Cultural Proficiency:**

  - Adapt to a multicultural work environment and handle bilingual (Arabic and English) development challenges effectively.

  - Stay abreast of the latest trends in mobile and web technologies, particularly those relevant to RTL and bilingual development.


4. **Problem-Solving and Optimization:**

  - Proactively tackle technical challenges, ensuring high performance and responsiveness of our platforms.

  - Optimize applications for maximum efficiency and scalability across various devices and operating systems.


**Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

- 3-5 years of experience in mobile and web development, with a focus on React Native.

- Strong expertise in JavaScript and familiarity with web and mobile development tools.

- Proven experience in RTL and bilingual (Arabic and English) application development.

- Ability to collaborate effectively with digital marketing teams for integration and optimization.

- Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to challenges.

- Open to remote candidates globally, with a preference for Arabic speakers.


**What We Offer:**

- The opportunity to be a part of a super growth and innovative company.

- Competitive salary, with the flexibility of remote work.

- A dynamic and multicultural work environment.

- Extensive opportunities for professional growth and development.


**Application Process:**

We welcome applications from candidates around the world. Please submit your resume, a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience, and a portfolio showcasing your work in mobile and web development, particularly in bilingual and RTL contexts.


Join us in shaping the future of digital-led service and retail, where your skills and passion will drive our collective success.

title: Lead/Senior Backend Engineer (Fintech)
description:
The world's first wallet connected debit card that lets you spend funds directly from any EVM non-custodial wallet without having to off-ramp or lock/transfer your on-chain balance.

The foundation will be our off-chain collateralized stablecoins (starting with USD, EUR and GBP) that we’ll embed with real-world financial rails integrations (Visa, Mastercard, SEPA, SWIFT, FPS) to enable free and seamless movement between fiat and cryptocurrencies.

The Role

As a Backend Engineer, you’ll be directly working with the product team. In this fast pace environment, you’ll be given complex banking and crypto problems to solve, develop and deploy. You are obsessed with good architecture, efficiency, and resilience and want nothing but the best product for our customers.

Your speed, ability to deliver, and capacity to come up with the most elegant solutions will make you one of the pillars of our engineering team.

We want to revolutionize the FinTech industry. Create a new paradigm. And we need the best minds to do it.

Your Responsibilities Will Include

  • Design and build the app’s Core API, in-house ledger and onboarding flows
  • Integrate with key 3rd party providers for KYC/AML/Payment flows
  • Maintain our CI/CD pipeline and security infrastructure (together with the rest of the Engineering team)

Ideal Profile

What We Are Looking For

  • Experience with Java, Redis, Spring Boot, Kotlin
  • Understanding of relational and no-SQL databases
  • Experience in Fintech
  • Ability to develop, test and deploy microservices to support our core banking services
  • Experience with GCP or AWS
  • Ability to develop, debug, test, and deploy mobile APIs
  • 4+ years of experience as a Backend Engineer
  • Experience with crypto/web3
  • Experience with payments

What's on Offer?

  • Leadership Role
  • Excellent career development opportunities
  • Work alongside & learn from best in class talent

title: Technical Lead ( Java)
description:
About The Role

You will be responsible for building and maintaining highly scalable, fully performing applications on cloud and on premise. Your Responsibilities include developing, implementing, maintaining critical application using cutting edge software technologies, and following coding standard, technical designs and security guidelines.

Roles And Responsibilities

  • Lead a cross-functional technical team for Design and develop high quality and reliable code with unit test cases, meeting given specifications.
  • Create Documentation, sequence diagram and other low-level design artefacts.
  • Perform code analysis, peer reviews, requirement analysis, software review, system risk analysis and software reliability analysis.
  • Ensures the developed code covers the non-functional requirements including performance, security, auditing and integrity.
  • Resolve production incidents or defects as needed, and proactively identify potential issues before they appear in the production environment; contribute to the root cause analysis.
  • Drive high performance and accountability for own deliverables. Work well within a team and always work for team success by supporting other team members, constructively acting on feedback, and identifying challenging opportunities that enhance career growth.
  • Contribute in defining secure coding standards and work in a team to follow best practices to ensure quality, scalability, and security of deliverables.
  • Tackle challenges and solve complex problems on a daily basis.

Be part of an extraordinary story

Your skills. Your imagination. Your ambition. Here, there are no boundaries to your potential and the impact you can make. You’ll find infinite opportunities to grow and work on the biggest, most rewarding challenges that will build your skills and experience. You have the chance to be a part of our future, and build the life you want while being part of an international community.

Our best is here and still to come. To us, impossible is only a challenge. Join us as we dare to achieve what’s never been done before. Together, everything is possible.

Qualifications

Qualifications - External

About You

  • Relevant college or University qualification to minimum Bachelor’s level
  • Minimum 6 years’ experience in designing and developing Java applications
  • Expertise in Java, Spring boot, micro services and hibernate
  • Hands-on experience working with RESTful web services and JSON
  • Should have expertise of conceptualizing domain model, high level design and specifying the low-level design / pseudocode and have spent at least 2 years in a Technical lead role.
  • Knowledge of cloud technologies and Kubernetes
  • Expertise in development using Agile Methodologies
  • Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot and program complex application stack
  • Hands-on experience in building customer facing applications preferably in travel domain will be an added advantage
  • Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and ensure the transparency of the work.
  • Good delegation, time management and communication skills

About Qatar Airways Group

Our story started with four aircraft. Today, we deliver excellence across 12 different businesses coming together as one. We’ve grown fast, broken records and set trends that others follow. We don’t slow down by the fear of failure. Instead, we dare to achieve what’s never been done before.

So whether you’re creating a unique experience for our customers or innovating behind the scenes, every person contributes to our proud story. A story of spectacular growth and determination. Now is the time to bring your best ideas and passion to a place where your ambition will know no boundaries, and be part of a truly global community.

How To Apply

If you’re ready to join a progressive team and have a challenging and rewarding career, then apply now by uploading your CV and completing our quick application form.

title: APIGEE Platform Lead - Enterprise Architect
description:
We are one of the largest groups in the MENA region. As the corporate center, we are developing select businesses in our industry adjacencies that are likely to benefit from synergies with our telecom business.


The establishment of a Fintech business across our markets is a key priority in the context. We set up a regionally oriented organization that develops & manages the fintech proposition, international partners, branding etc. and works with local subsidiaries for the go-to market. A strong user experience and partner-oriented approach will be the foundation of a long-term differentiation in the market while agile co-creation in the team, an entrepreneurial mindset and a “can do attitude” are key traits we are looking for.


Role Accountabilities:

Enterprise Architect responsibilities include improving current API inventory, Building APIs Products, leading API Standardization, transforming use cases to APIs, Defining API security policies and ensure API Governance:


  • Knowledge and hands-on of API best practices implementation, API Lifecycle, and performance tuning
  • API Analytics - generation of custom reports and integration with external tools.
  • Experience in GCP integration for Hybrid APIGEE Setup.
  • Developer and Partner portal setup and customization. Drupal experience
  • Knowledge of build and deployment methodologies with Apigee across environments
  • Experience in API Administration
  • Strong knowledge of Apigee component architecture and implementation configurations
  • Experience setting up Apigee Edge environments and configuring various components
  • High availability, load balancing and failover configurations with Apigee
  • API Support
  • Good experience in supporting the Apigee environments and APIs across environments
  • Knowledge of health checks and monitoring procedures for Apigee components & APIs
  • Analysis of APIGEE logs to identify and resolve issue sent


Experience & Qualifications

  • BSc in computer science, information systems or equivalent field
  • Master’s degree is plus
  • At least 10 years of experience in technology consulting, enterprise and solutions architecture and architectural frameworks.
  • At least 8 years of experience in Enterprise Integration/Middleware Solutions, API Management in building solutions and architectural frameworks.
  • At least 6 years of experience in API Development and Strategy
  • At least 4 years of experience in implementing API Security and Access Control (OAuth/SAML, Web SSO, SSL etc.)
  • Strong experience in IT and Telecommunication standards development and implementation
  • Strong experience in APIGEE Implementation and standardization, best practices
  • Experience in Project Management and Agile methodologies
  • Certified in TOGAF
  • Certified in TM Forum Open APIs
  • Certified in Agile Methodology, and Devops
